description:
Description


DEAR.MAY Finger Tip Smudge Brush delivers easy, seamless blending with its soft silicone tip.
Perfect for lips and cheeks, it works well with cream-based products like blush and concealer.
The hygienic, non-absorbent tip is easy to clean and reuse.
Compact and portable with a cap—ideal for touch-ups on the go.
 
How To Use

Swipe the product onto the silicone tip and gently dab or blend onto lips or cheeks.
After use, simply wipe the tip clean. Compatible with cream-type blushes, primers, concealers, and eyeshadows.

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.content: I ordered from here less than a week ago, got a bunch of stuff in the $8.88 sale, hit the $90 free shipping benchmark and then was able to use a coupon to pay only $75 for like a lot of great products. I didn't at all trust the 3-5 day shipping estimate, but then it arrived from South Korea to NY in 4 days?! I was impressed, not even gonna lie. I don't know why one of the reviews on here says the products are very convincing dupes, I even compared the replacement beauty of joseon sunscreen I got with the one I'm nearly out of, and it's simply the same exact product, and the other two sunscreens I got with my order are totally distinctive and great formulas, so I'm curious what their experience was...

description:
Description


DEEP PORE CLEANSING: Equipped with 2,000 ultra-soft micro-bristles, the brush effectively cleanses deep into the pores, removing dirt, oil, and debris for a more refined, clear complexion.
FLEXIBLE SILICONE BRISTLES: The flexible silicone bristles contour to every curve, effortlessly removing impurities, dead skin cells, and excess oil. Enjoy a refreshed and smooth complexion as the bristles reach even hard-to-clean areas like the sides of the nose and under the lips.
COMFORTABLE GRIP: The handy sized grip provides a secure and comfortable hold, helping you effortlessly apply the clay mask cleanser on your face.
DESIGNED FOR UNCLOGGED PORES: Achieve the best results by pairing the silicone brush with Fully Green Tomato Clay Mask Cleanser. The cleanser and brush work harmoniously together, delivering deeper cleansing and enhanced skincare benefits.
SUSTAINABILITY: FULLY embraces sustainability, our packaging features FSC-certified paper boxes and soy ink, coupled with a formula that effectively improves skin elasticity.
 
How To Use

When washing your face, take an appropriate amount and lather it, roll it on a wet face, massage it, and wash it off

description:
Description

Versatile Design: Duo tweezers with various configurations for multiple uses.
Convenient Use: Lightweight and easy to handle with a comfortable grip.
Precision Tips: Fine-tuned tips for gentle use without irritation.

How To Use


For Eyebrow Grooming: Pluck stray hairs one by one, following the natural growth direction of the eyebrows.
For Eyelash Application: Use the tweezers to pick up the eyelashes and attach them close to the roots to secure them in place.
For Individual Lash Effect: Apply a light coat of mascara to your lashes, then dip the tip of the tweezers into the same product and gather two or three lashes together.

description:
Description

High Color Retention with Dense Synthetic Bristles: Dense, high-quality synthetic bristles enhance adherence for vibrant, long-lasting color.
Hygienic Storage and Portable Convenience: Features a built-in brush cap for hygienic storage and easy portability.
Minimized Crumbling: The ideal bristle thickness prevents lipstick from clumping and reduces cracking when applied.
Custom Cutting for Different Uses: Available in two cutting shapes to suit various application needs.

Portable Lip Brush 223 Round: Provides natural color application and watercolor-like blending.
Portable Lip Brush 211 Flat: Delivers precise color and defines the lip line sharply.
How To Use

* Round Type: After applying lip product, lightly sweep with the brush and blend along the lip edges for a natural smudged look.
* Flat Type: Apply lip product along the lip line with the brush, then use the broad side to fill in the color on the lips. Alternatively, use it to apply a gloss formula.

description:
Description


Optimized High-Elastic Bristles for Coverage: The right amount of elasticity effectively fills in pores and conceals blemishes.
Custom Cutting for Different Areas: Different sizes and cuts tailored to specific areas and uses, allowing for targeted application based on your needs.
Minimized Crumbling: The appropriate bristle thickness prevents base from clumping or separating, ensuring smooth application and minimal cracking.

Concealer Brush 484: Ideal for covering freckles and dark circles with thin, even coverage over moderate areas.
Spot Concealer Brush 474: Perfect for covering small blemishes and detailed imperfections with a precise, thin application.
Corrector & Concealer Brush 482: Best for quickly tone-correcting large areas like the T-zone and butterfly zone without emphasizing fine lines or pores.

How To Use

After thoroughly absorbing the product into the brush, lightly touch and cover the problem areas. For areas with prominent pores, gently tap to fill in the pores for a smoother coverage.

description:

- Clump-Free Moist Bristles: Ensures thorough coverage of fine pores without streaks.
- Gentle Round Cutting: Fits facial contours for a thin and flawless finish.

reviews.title: Pretty
reviews.content: After reading the reviews from this website, I was afraid to order, but decided to take the risk. I placed an order for the minimum for free shipping amount (60 USD), and after applying all the promo codes, it turned out to be 48 euros. I ordered to Germany, so I knew about the additional payments, but I didn't know exactly how much they would be. The order was delivered exactly one week after the order was placed (March 5th - March 13th). I had to pay the import VAT - about 12 euros, and DHL also charged 12.5 euros (+2 euros VAT) for its customs clearance services.
